author: Reuters
title: Gold drops to lowest in more than a week
description: Spot gold was down 0.2% to $1,680.46 per ounce, having touched its lowest since April 9, at $1,670.55.
content:
Gold touched its lowest in more than a week on Monday, as the dollar strengthened ahead of a raft of corporate earnings and macro data that will highlight the economic damage from the coronavirus crisis.
